subcontent.content: A foe targets your ally with an ability, and your ally is in range 3.
You soar into the air, removing yourself from the battlefield, then return in any space adjacent to that ally.
Remove an afterimage that has no characters occupying it, then remove yourself and place yourself in its space.
Deal 2 damage to any foe in range 4 and shove them 1 space towards you, then force them to save. On a failed save, they are shoved 2 more spaces towards you.
You are defeated.

You fight on, remaining standing at 1 hp and do not become defeated until the end of your next turn, or if combat ends before then. During that time, damage cannot reduce you past 1 hp and you deal bonus damage with all abilities.
Also deal fray damage twice to all adjacent foes.
shove character 1 towards you.

description.content: Gains True Strike and replace the base effect with

subcontent.content: gain +1 vigilance for every status your foe is suffering from, to a maximum of three times, then gain counter until the end of your next turn.
A foe targets an ally in range 2 with an ability.

Gamble, then deal that much damage to your foe. On a 6, they are also slashed and shoved 1. If you have vigilance, you can spend any number of vigilance charges when gambling to roll one extra d6 per charge spent.

description.content: As above, but replace the base effect with

subcontent.content: until the end of your next turn, gain aura 1. Foes in the aura cannot be cured and cannot save to clear statuses.
The start or end of any turn other than yours.

Gamble, then the marked character dashes a number of spaces equal to the gamble result, 1 space at a time. Each tim they finish a dash, they may deal 2 damage to an adjacent foe, but cannot damage the same foe more than once in the same turn.
The end of any turn.
Teleport 2 towards the target or teleport your target 1 towards you. The teleport must end with both of you closer together. Allies can choose whether to take this teleport.

description.content: Teleport your foe up to 3 spaces towards you instead of teleporting yourself. A foe can save to avoid this effect. Blinded foes fail this save.

subcontent.content: If you catch an ally or allied summon in the area, you and your allies are immune to this ability’s damage and effects, and you may extend the area effect to arc 8.
You take damage from a foe.
End this stance, consume and remove all
sm_shadow

in range 2 of you, and immediately gain defiance against the incoming damage. Deal 2 damage, once, to the triggering foe for each shadow consumed this way. You cannot take this stance again for the rest of combat.
deal 3 damage to all characters marked by Incubus, and teleport them 2.
As a free action ability, you and allies can teleport from any space adjacent to an underway to a free adjacent space to any other underway. This ability does not interrupt movement or other action.

description.content: Gains True Strike and Medium Blast.

subcontent.content: Autohit:
Fray damage.
Fray damage.
Create a pit under your target.
An ally in range 5 is blessed and may fly 4. For every foe or ally they pass over during this movement, they gain 2 vigor.
Remove an ally in range 5 from the battlefield. Return them to the battlefield in their original location or as close as possible at the start of their turn, then they may fly 1.
Reduce the action cost of this ability by 1 for every two blessing tokens your target has, down to a minimum of a free action.
Autohit:
[D] + fray.
Fray.
All pits in the area explode for a medium blast area effect, centered on them.
Create a pit under the attack target.
Gain aura 1 until the end of your next turn. While in the aura, yourself and allies gain +1 boon on saves and can save to end statuses and other effects at the start of your turns instead of the end.

Choose a foe in range. At the end of that foe’s next turn, either cure or bless allies in a small blast area centered on them (choose). If there were two or more allies in the area, then create a pit under that foe.
On Hit:
[D] + fray.
Miss:
Fray.
Summon a
sm_thrall
adjacent to your target.
Repeat the effect.
You can make this melee attack against the target marked by Sow regardless of distance or line of sight. It also gains unerring if made this way.
Mark an ally in range. While marked, that character has regeneration. If that character is at 25% hp or lower when marked, they also gain defiance.
This mark can be placed even if Rot is already active.

Mark a character in range 4. If that character would be defeated before the start of your next turn, they are instantly rescued after being defeated, then gain a vigor surge and become unstoppable until the end of their next turn. Then, even if this effect didn’t trigger, summon a
sm_plant
in an adjacent space to them and end this mark.
A foe enters or exits the area.
Teleport that foe 2 and seal them. This interrupts but does not end their movement.
You or an ally makes an attack roll, and you see the total result (after boons, curses, and other adjustments).
Add the number on your mantra die to the attack roll, which changes the final result. That foe also takes damage again after the attack resolves equal to the number on your mantra die.
Teleport 1.
On Hit:
[D] + Fray.
Miss:
Fray.
Character explodes in a medium blast area effect centered on them, dealing 1 divine damage to all foes.
Repeat the effect.
Teleport 1.
On Hit:
[D] + Fray.
Miss:
Fray.
Seal your foe, then bless yourself or an ally in range 2.
Character explodes in a medium blast area effect centered on them, dealing 1 divine damage to all foes.
Repeat all effects.

Aura 2. You can use this ability again while adjacent to your shrine to increase its size, increasing the height by +1. The shrine gains additional benefits equal to its total height, including other objects it is stacked on:
Yourself and allies in the aura have cover from characters from the outside and gain +1 boon on attack rolls.
Yourself and allies in the aura gain 2 vigor when you end your turn there.
Yourself and allies in the aura have evasion.
An ally in the aura is damaged by an foe’s ability.

Your ally becomes immune to all damage from the triggering ability. Destroy the shrine, then deal 2 divine damage, once, to the foe per height of the shrine. You cannot place shrines for the rest of combat.
You score a Critical Hit or trigger an Exceed effect.
Gamble, then you may teleport yourself and each character in range 2 half that far. Foes are pacified.
You score a Critical Hit or trigger an Exceed effect.
Deal 4 divine damage to all foes on the battlefield above bloodied, and all bloodied allies are blessed and gain 2 vigor.
Teleport spaces equal to the round number before the attack.
On Hit:
[D] + Fray.
Miss:
Fray.
Deal 1 damage again to your target. At round 4 or later, increase this damage to 6.

[D] + Fray.
Foes take fray damage. Allies gain 3 vigor and are
tr_bless
Summon a

in the area.
An ally in the aura is targeted by a foe’s ability.

Tick down your power die by any amount. Gamble with a number of d6s equal to the number of ticks you spent, then that ally gains vigor equal to double the gamble result. However, at the end of the current turn, your ally loses all vigor.
After this ability resolves, scathing divine lightning hits a quarter of the map of your choice. Characters within take [D]+fray Divine damage.
